messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] looking for asmaa
messages.msgSnippet: Kelly, I a friend of mine has an unschooling neighbor who is Muslim.  I ll forward this to my friend and she can take it from there. Nichole ... From:
messages.messageBody:
Kelly, I a friend of mine has an unschooling neighbor who is Muslim. I'll forward this to my friend and she can take it from there.

Nichole

----- Original Message -----
From: kbcdlovejo@...
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com ; UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com ; AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, September 09, 2004 3:16 PM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] looking for asmaa


I was contacted to day by a mom in SC who wants to learn more about
unschooling. Her issue is that her family is Muslim. She's looking to connect with
other Muslim unschooling families. The only one I know is Asmaa---where are you?

If there's someone els willing to talk with her, I'll forward you her info.
Please let me know!

Thanks!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
